name: Composeman: The Game (Demo)
description:
Jump, shoot and float through a action-filled stage that represents the life of a classical composer! Composeman is a one-stage demo of a hypothetical video game inspired by classical music and the Mega Man series.

Though framed and presented as a full game, this is a proof-of-concept that only contains one level: "Bologne Man", loosely based on the locations that Joseph Bologne lived in during his life.

A full version is currently not planned - though I would like to hear if there's sufficient interest! Please consider donating or signing up on my Patreon to support future projects if it fancies you.

The original "Compose Man" is a fan album by Chips 'N Cellos of an imaginary Mega Man fan game with classical composers as robot masters. This demo uses the soundtrack under a CC BY-NC-SA 3.0 licence and spins it into a standalone game.

ChipsNCellos Youtube: https://www.youtube.com/c/ChipsNCellos

Thanks for reading, and have fun!
